Maria Usifo (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1964) bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme egwuregwu na onye bụbu onye egwuregwu Olimpik nke nọchitere anya Naijirịa n'egwuregwu Los Angeles (1984) na Seoul (1988) Olympic Games. Ọ bụ ọkachamara na 100 na 400 mita ihe mgbochi. Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị na-eme egwuregwu n'akụkọ egwuregwu nke Naijirịa bụ ndị na-achịkwa ihe omume egwuregwu ma na mba na mba ụwa.
Usifo malitere ọrụ ya na egwuregwu na Naijirịa n'afọ ndị 1970 mgbe usoro egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ na-arụ ọrụ

Ọ bụbu onye na-agba ọsọ na onye na-eme egwuregwu nke egwuregwu ya meghere ohere maka ya ịhọrọ na mahadum 10 mba ọzọ mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ịrịba ama na Commonwealth Games ṅa Brisbane, Australia na 1982

O sonyere n'egwuregwu Olympic na Los Angeles na 1984 na Seoul na 1988. Usifo bụ onye nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo nke egwuregwu niile n'Africa na onye nwetara ihe nkiri ọla edo nke African Championships.

Àtụ:Footer All-Africa Champions 100 m Hurdles WomenÀtụ:Footer All-Africa Champions 400 m Hurdles WomenÀtụ:Footer African Champions women's 100 metres hurdlesÀtụ:Footer African Champions women's 400 metres hurdles
